attributes.action: Lower the prices of food,housing etc
attributes.additional_details: Poor family’s are struggling, even homeless people, like how do u expect us to live off of what money we get!
attributes.background: Poor family’s are always struggling because of the prices of food, rent, everything in general, I think prices need to be lower

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the cost of living, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
